### &#x2714; Pull Request Checklist
- [ ] Branch is current with main
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code (i.e., run tests, check for dead code, linting...)
- [ ] If functionality has been added/changed, relevant tests have been added/changed
- [ ] I have incremented the package version number (usually in `pyproject.toml`)
- [ ] Ask (preferably a specific person) for a review in [#pull-requests](https://cfa.enterprise.slack.com/archives/C061K59T75L)
- [ ] Refer to the [code review checklist](https://sites.google.com/cfa.harvard.edu/mpc/mpc-documentation/mpc-software?authuser=0#h.ksedzoorrhw8)
